title: 胡锡进说美国不派兵登陆香港就不算强烈反应， 他是否脑子坏了？
contents:
Will you really send US troops to land on Hong Kong? If you don't', your “powerful” response is nothing but bluffing, isn’t it? Canceling Hong Kong's separate customs territory status is not “powerful,” and China has long been prepared for that.

https://twitter.com/HuXijin_GT/status/1265498343947542530

胡锡进不愧是加速主义大师，美军真的来了他肯定第一个箪食壶浆以迎王师。
